name: Assetfinder
description: Finds subdomains using Assetfinder and saves the output to a file.

name: Subfinder -domain
description: Finds subdomains using Subfinder for a single domain and saves the output to a file.

name: Subfinder -list
description: Finds subdomains using Subfinder from a list of domains and saves the output to a file.

name: Sublist3r
description: Finds subdomains using Sublist3r and saves the output to a file.

name: Amass
description: Enumerates subdomains using Amass and saves the output to a file.

name: MassDNS
description: Resolves subdomains using MassDNS and saves the output to a file.

name: Sort and Unique
description: Combines and sorts subdomain lists, removes duplicates, and saves the output to a file.

name: Resolver
description: Resolves subdomains using Shuffledns and saves the output to a file.

name: Dnsx Recon
description: Performs DNS reconnaissance using Dnsx and saves the output to a file.

name: HTTProbe
description: Probes resolved subdomains for HTTP/HTTPS services and saves the output to a file.

name: 403 Checker
description: Checks for 403 Forbidden responses using a custom script and saves the output to a file.

name: Waybackpy
description: Retrieves URLs from Wayback Machine and saves the output to a file.

name: Gau
description: Extracts URLs using Gau and saves the output to a file.

name: Sort URLs
description: Combines and sorts URL lists, removes duplicates, and saves the output to a file.

name: Nuclei
description: Performs vulnerability scanning using Nuclei and saves the output to a file.

name: GF Pattern Matching
description: Performs pattern matching using GF and saves the output to a file.

name: Sn1per
description: Performs comprehensive reconnaissance using Sn1per and saves the output to a file.

name: Autorecon
description: Performs automated reconnaissance using Autorecon and saves the output to a file.

name: LinkFinder
description: Finds links and endpoints using LinkFinder and saves the output to a file.

name: Meg
description: Finds hidden endpoints using Meg and saves the output to a file.

name: FFUF
description: Performs directory fuzzing using FFUF and saves the output to a file.

name: SQLmap
description: Performs SQL injection testing using SQLmap and saves the output to a file.

name: XSStrike
description: Performs XSS testing using XSStrike and saves the output to a file.

name: Dirsearch
description: Performs directory and file brute-forcing using Dirsearch and saves the output to a file.

name: Subjack
description: Checks for subdomain takeover vulnerabilities using Subjack and saves the output to a file.

name: CSP Evaluator
description: Evaluates Content Security Policies (CSP) using CSP Evaluator and saves the output to a file.

name: GitHound
description: Gathers information from GitHub repositories using GitHound and saves the output to a file.

name: LinkFinder
description: Finds links and endpoints using LinkFinder and saves the output to a file.
